FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.label: One People United
FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.desc: A society united by common cause holds the strongest of wills for the hardest duties. +50% happiness gain, +1 military level on settlements, -10% basetax.

FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.label: Diversity We Embrace
FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.desc: A diverse society has no unfilled cracks that could collapse itself. +15% basetax, +50% unrest gain, +.5 prosperity recovery.

FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.label: Royal Heritage
FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.desc: A society under the command of a royal family is unified in its traditions. +$25 modifier to tithe taxes, -10% cost to build a new settlement, -500 silver cost to build a settlement.

FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.label: Company Union
FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.desc: A corporation that has struck out their create their own self-sufficient trade empire. -$10 to worker cost, +1 Max worker, +2 overmax workers.

FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.label: Trader's Federation
FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.desc: A society in which those of power are those with the wealth to spend. +10% tax, -$25 modifier for tithes, +$15 worker cost.

FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.label: Science Foundation
FactionColonies.PolicyFCDef.desc: A society that values knowledge and exploring the unknown. +25% research production. -5% base tax.
